Texts.Eng: It even has a spear - Nuru will love this! I can't thank you enough!

Um, it turns out Florans aren't very interested in museums; I was talking about my plans earlier and Nuru asked me what a "mesuam" was... ^green;Maybe if you brought me a ^orange;Floran Statue^white; from a Floran village or hunting ground, it might make the museum seem more enticing?
